plot outline: Sohra Bridge tells the story of a daughter who embarks on a journey, across the remote expanses of North-East India, looking for her father. She finds herself drawn towards a complex labyrinth of memory and imagination. the film conjures up a magical reality, where real gives way to the surreal, bloodshed to the poetry, memory to the imaginary, and vice versa.
title: Sohra Bridge
plot: Memories, imagination and reality come together in the journey of a young girl looking for her estranged father. The unexplored, beautiful and politically volatile North East of India provides the backdrop.

_Sohra Bridge_ (qv) tells the story of a daughter who embarks on a journey, across the remote expanses of North-East India, looking for her father. She finds herself drawn towards a complex labyrinth of memory and imagination. the film conjures up a magical reality, where real gives way to the surreal, bloodshed to the poetry, memory to the imaginary, and vice versa.
